blogPost.excerpt: Anicons is a pack of stylish and playful 3D icons that can be used instantly in your projects. The pack consists of 30 high-res, well-organized and commonly-used icons that can be customized easily.
blogPost.body: Anicons is a pack of stylish and playful 3D icons that can be used instantly in your projects. The pack consists of 30 high-res, well-organized and commonly-used icons that can be customized easily.
blogPost.title: Anicons - A pack of customizable 3D icons
blogPost.author: kushagra gour

localize.description: Anicons是一个时尚有趣的3D图标包，可以立即用于你的项目中。该包由30个高分辨率、井然有序、常用的图标组成，可以轻松定制。
Anicons是一個時尚有趣的3D圖標包，可以立即用於你的項目中。該包由30個高分辨率、井然有序、常用的圖標組成，可以輕鬆定製。

previous.excerpt: BlueReceipt is Text Marketing Automation for Shopify Brands. It's like Mailchimp X Slack built around text messaging your customers. Popups, Automations, and Broadcasts in a powerful dashboard. Get our free starter plan and start in < 5 minutes!
previous.title: BlueReceipt - Text marketing customers love ❤️

localize.description: BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本营销自动化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一样，围绕着给您的客户发送短信而建立。在一个强大的仪表板中实现弹出式、自动和广播。获取我们的免费入门计划，并在<5分钟内开始!
BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本營銷自動化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一樣，圍繞着給您的客戶發送短信而建立。在一個強大的儀表板中實現彈出式、自動和廣播。獲取我們的免費入門計劃，並在<5分鐘內開始!

next.excerpt: Email clients like Gmail have intelligent algorithms & know your email sending history. When you make an email marketing mistake they put you in the SPAM Jail. To come out you need to establish good sender reputation & WarmupYourEmail helps you do that.
next.title: Warmup Your Email - Always land in Inbox by establishing sender reputation

localize.description: 像Gmail这样的邮件客户端有智能算法，知道你的邮件发送历史。当你犯了电子邮件营销的错误，他们会把你关进垃圾邮件监狱。要想出来，您需要建立良好的发件人声誉，而WarmupYourEmail可以帮助您做到这一点。
localize.tagline: 通过建立发件人的信誉，总是能落在收件箱中。

localize.description: 像Gmail這樣的郵件客戶端有智能算法，知道你的郵件發送歷史。當你犯了電子郵件營銷的錯誤，他們會把你關進垃圾郵件監獄。要想出來，您需要建立良好的發件人聲譽，而WarmupYourEmail可以幫助您做到這一點。
localize.tagline: 通過建立發件人的信譽，總是能落在收件箱中。
